QuestData.Title: Parker's Report
QuestData.Description: <Watch Captain Parker hands you a report.>$B$BHere it is, $n. Take my report to Lakeshire, located north of this tower, and deliver it to Magistrate Solomon. Inform him that we need a more comprehensive solution for dealing with the gnolls. Suggest explosives. Lots of explosives.$B$BAnd stick to the road if you know what's good for you.$B$BWhat's good for you is staying alive, by the way. In case you didn't know what was good for you. You now know... Oh never mind!
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver Parker's Report to Magistrate Solomon at Lakeshire in Redridge.
QuestData.CompletionText: Where did I put my monocle?! Conacher is that you?
QuestData.RewardText: <Magistrate Solomon puts on his monocle.>$B$BOh, you're not Conacher. What have you got there?$B$B<Magistrate Solomon takes Parker's report from you.>$B$BOh for pity's sake. Yowler? AGAIN?
